short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to automatically accumulate the points earned by watching your favourite streamers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically accumulates the points earned by watching Twitch streams. It requires no configuration and does not collect any data from you. The code is open source and can be found at https://github.com/Morzat95/Twitch-Score-Collector-Extension
